about-me.text: I'm Julian Pinilla, i'm currently finishing my degree in Systems Engineering at the University of Cundinamarca in Colombia. I work as a fullstack developer with specialization in frontend development.

projectsInfo.movieverse: MovieVerse is a website made with React, where you can search for movies of your interest, see information about them, and if you wish, add them to your favorites list
projectsInfo.palaa: Palaa is a website based on a video game of the same name, this was made as a university project using React (Only the frontend works, the backend is very possible that it is not working)
projectsInfo.pokedex: This is a website that recreates a Pokedex, using the 'PokeAPI' api, which has the functionality of the Pokedex seen in the Pokemon anime, this website was made with native Javascript
projectsInfo.math: Math is a website where you can calculate areas and perimeters of certain figures, and also calculate some types of averages. This website was made with native Javascript
projectsInfo.eternity: Eternity is a website where you can save notes, these are divided into 'public' notes and 'private' notes, the difference is that to access the private note you need a password. The site is still in beta
